snippet.title: Tower of Chaos - coming May 29th!
snippet.description:
Get it on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2080250/Tower_of_Chaos//?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=demo_trailer&utm_medium=organic

Every scene you can see in the trailer is playable in demo.
Tower of Chaos uniquely blends auto battler, risk-and-reward exploration, and rogue-lite gameplay. Battle your way through altering floors of the afterlife tower, manage your resources and relive the origins of your allies.
